row.process:
:switch &$PLATFORM# :case "WINDOWS" : set &SETENV#="set" echo off :case "UNIX" : set &SETENV#="export" :endswitch
:include PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :include PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
!Set environment variables :if &AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID# ne "" &SETENV# AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=&AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID# :endif
:if &AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY# ne "" : set &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = &AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY# : include PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : switch &$PLATFORM# : case "WINDOWS" &SETENV# AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD% : case "UNIX" &SETENV# AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD : endswitch :endif
:if &AWS_SESSION_TOKEN# ne "" &SETENV# AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=&AWS_SESSION_TOKEN# :endif
:if &AWS_DEFAULT_REGION# ne "" &SETENV# AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=&AWS_DEFAULT_REGION# :endif
:if &AWS_DEFAULT_PROFILE# ne "" &SETENV# AWS_DEFAULT_PROFILE=&AWS_DEFAULT_PROFILE# :endif
:if &AWS_CONFIG_FILE# ne "" &SETENV# AWS_CONFIG_FILE=&AWS_CONFIG_FILE# :endif
:set &CLI# = "aws s3"
